biotools.summary: Human Phenotype Ontology, a standardized vocabulary of phenotypic abnormalities encountered in human disease. With unmatched depth it enables clinicians to record and analyse data with extremely accurate computer interpretable ontology terms. Developed by The Monarch Initiative.

bioschemas.name: Human Phenotype Ontology
bioschemas.summary: Human Phenotype Ontology, a standardized vocabulary of phenotypic abnormalities encountered in human disease. With unmatched depth it enables clinicians to record and analyse data with extremely accurate computer interpretable ontology terms. Developed by The Monarch Initiative.
